An exciting drive through all Europe. Family also for the little ones.

name: Monopoly: University of Kent
description: Based on one of the UK's leading academic institutions, the University of Kent at Canterbury, known as the UK's European University.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Robodice
description:
Robot for the world invasion was out of control during the experiment! In order to activate the emergency stop program, it's insert a stop key to all the robot quickly!

In order to play this game the player have to provide 5 D6 that are not included in the game.

The goal of the game is to be able to put out all the dice on the slots on the game board in order 1 to 5.

You put out all the dice in order 1 to 5 on the different slots on the board, the problem is that each slot have an effect on the dice that have not yet been placed. The slots can make you either turn up or down the results of one other die, you could re-roll 1 or all dice and one slot will let you turn over one die to the other side (For an example 1 to a 6 or 5 to a 2).

This is a postcard sized solo game that was given away free at Essen 2014

name: Muddy Swampy Jungle Game
description: A roll-and-move game included as a fold-out in the book "Where's Waldo: The Incredible Paper Search", using punch-out components also in-lined in the book. Along with standard roll-and-move rules, some spaces require you to draw a card from a special deck that gives you a tongue twister to read aloud.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Roll / Spin and Move

name: A.O.C (Amusement d'origine contrôlée)
description:
A trivia about wine for wine lovers.

It contains:

6 bottle shaped pawns,
1 board
1 wine and grape variety glossary
1 dice and
320 cards - 640 questions with multiple choices in 8 themes:
grape varieties,
AOC appellations,
grands crus,
cultivation of the vines,
wine making,
tasting,
regulations,
wines from around the world.
mechanics: Events, Roll / Spin and Move, Track Movement

name: Duplex
description: In this word finding game the cards decide when two players have to duel for a minimum five letter word with the showing letters in it. Each duel a play wins is a victory point in the end and the player with the most victory points will win the game.

name: Totta vai Tarua?
description:
Trivia game with 1000 unexpected, funny and surprising questions.
Be fastest some times only one can answer. Speak Finnish, ask questions, tell the scores and comment about game-play. Includes 3 AA battery.

name: Black Hat: Celebrity Status Promo Deck
description:
The Black Hat: Celebrity Status Promo Deck was included in Kickstarter and Nordic editions and is made available from BGG store.

It adds a new dimension to the Black Hat game, by changing the winning conditions completely. Instead of aiming for lowest points, with Celebrity Status cards, you aim for your own score. The person who gets closest to his score wins.

name: Petopia: The Backyard War
description:
Petopia is a fast-paced, trapping and bluffing card game that a winner is the person who scores the goal of this game. You can choose your representative between dog or cat, who fights to win in the backyard.

All cards will be shuffled and distributed 5 cards per each player.Every player will get the health-token depends on the number of players. For example, 3-5 people will receive 4 tokens per person while 6-8 players will get 5 tokens for each player.Players need to draw a card and set some traps to make competitors lose their health points. Following the rules, you have to tell your opponents some details of those traps that you set up. For example, types of those traps (real trap or fake trap). Moreover, each player needs to bluff and challenge other players to remove the set-up traps or decide to keep those traps there. In case that your opponents remove the real trap, they will not lose any health point. Nevertheless, If they make a wrong decision by keeping them or remove the fake one, they will lose their health points. In the latter case, the player (yourself) who sets up the traps will earn the health point instead. Please see the full description of this game by reading in the later part. (How to play section) Keep in mind that you should not trust anyone but should be aware of what others keep saying. The real relationship might not exist on this backyard.
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Player Elimination, Push Your Luck

name: The Elf on the Shelf: Naughty or Nice Board Game
description: The Elf marker is placed in one of six locations on the board based on a card draw. Players spin to determine how far they can move (0-6 spaces) their pawns and the first player to reach the Elf's location gains a token worth 1-3 points. A new location is drawn for the Elf and the cycle is repeated six more times. The player with the highest point total after the Elf has been reached at the final location wins the game.

name: RaBATz!
description:
Description from the publisher:

Monsters upon monsters! But everybody has brought a different musical instrument for the night-time monster concert. Each card is played in front of the young conductors and covered by the next card. Who will be alert enough in RaBATz! to know which monsters have already been on which stage?

What's more, once a trio has performed and has been recognized correctly, the search changes. Now players need to find three of the same musical instruments!

name: Castle Assault: Halting Force Promo Card
description:
Promo Card for Castle Assault given out at GAMA 2016

Epic Neutral Command
Cost: 1
Target Unit gains -3 Movement while Charging for 1 turn (does not move backwards)
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement

name: Maurice vs. Niek
description:
The Dutch game association Ducosim publishes the game magazine Spel!. With this magazine they will publish several 'Spel!enkaarten' (gamecards). These are games which fit on a A5 card. #0020 is 'Maurice vs. Niek', and was published for the 40 year anniversary.

This game is an area enclosure game by Martyn F for 2-4 players. Each player controls 3 committee members on a 12x9 board. Each turn, a player moves one of his committee members in a straight line, and then places two blocking pieces (Ducosim members) on a spot where two of his committee members could move to. A player controls an enclosed area if he has the only committee member there.
The person with the most enclosed squares (most are worth 1, some 11) wins the game when a player can take no more moves.

name: Soccer: The Board Game
description:
Soccer: The Board Game is a fast-paced 2-player sports board game that captures the thrill and excitement of soccer. You, the Coach, can lead your team to victory by using real soccer practice and strategies that give your team more chances to score. This board game is pure competitive soccer fun. Challenge someone to a friendly match or start a tournament and take your team to the top!

In this game, each player controls opposing teams. Movement is determined by rolling a die and moving the plans and ball a total number of spaces as determined by the die roll, all within 30 seconds. When a player can attempt a goal, the players determine if it is successful by having a roll off. Penalties are resolved with cards. The game has an included timer so the turns can be kept to 30 seconds and the game to 30 minutes overall.

name: Black Stories: Promostory "An der Leistungsgrenze"
description:
This is a promotional Game: Black Stories given out for free at the publisher's booth at SPIEL Essen 2016.

It will be contained in the upcoming Black Stories Strange World Edition. Black Stories are tricky, morbid, sinister riddlestories. The players try to reconstruct the particulars of each incident, piece by piece, by asking yes-or-no-questions.

The promo story can be played on its own, without any actual Black Stories edition.
categories: Card Game, Deduction, Horror, Humor, Murder/Mystery, Party Game

name: The Powerpuff Girls: Saving Townsville Before Bedtime!
description:
Watch out! Townsville has been taken over by villains and only the Powerpuff Girls can help!

This is a cooperative game where the players will work together to move the Powerpuff girls around the board to uncover villains to fight. Each Powerpuff Girl can fight alone (using the dice with erasable sides) or can work together to fight stronger villains. But after each turn, time will pass and the professor will move along the time track (leading to bedtime). Defeat 5 villains, including Mojo Jojo, before bedtime and you win!
categories: Children's Game, Movies / TV / Radio theme

name: Monopoly: Wrocław
description:
Monopoly is a roll-and-move game where players move around the game board buying or trading properties, developing their properties with houses and hotels. When opponents land on players owned property, the owning player collects rent from the landing player. Owning sets of properties increases the rent paid to the player who owns them, by the player who lands on the square. The ultimate goal is to have the most money and drive opponents into bankruptcy.

The classic Monopoly with constructions and other elements of Wrocław, a city in Poland.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading
